talk_1042:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey, could you...<sp:5:0:0>please report...<sp:5:0:0>a freshly
discovered abandoned mine for me?<sp:5:0:0> Or,
even better, keep watch while I report it?
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Ease>Blech... <sp:5:0:0>The Depths wasn't great, but at
least it was <clr:0000>never too hot or cold<clr:ffff>.

I hope they'll reassign me soon.<sp:5:0:0> 
Anywhere's got to be better than Eldin.
talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>What do you mean, what's the matter?<sp:5:0:0>
It's <clr:0000>hot<clr:ffff>! This place is sweltering!<sp:5:1:0> Do you
have fireproof skin or something?
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>Blech, <sp:5:0:0>I'll give the Depths one thing...it's
usually <clr:0000>never too hot or cold<clr:ffff>.

Wherever I'm assigned next,<sp:5:0:0> I hope it's
somewhere other than Eldin.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Huh?<sp:5:0:0> Why am I "assigned" anywhere?
talk_1011:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive_00>Isn't that obvious?


I'm in the Yiga Clan. <sp:5:0:0>And we've been
assigned to take you down!
talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>This <clr:0000>heat<clr:ffff> is miserable.<sp:5:0:0> What a scorcher.


I'm so dizzy, I feel like I'm getting
delirious...

<snd:Ease_01>I swear I can hear his voice<sp:5:0:0> right nearby...


That detestable hero...
talk_1041:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey...<sp:5:0:0> Perfect timing.


Could you go tell the hideout that I found
an abandoned mine?<sp:5:1:0> Or better yet, stay
here while I do it?
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I just...<sp:5:0:0>can't take this place anymore...<sp:5:0:0>
The <clr:0000>heat's totally out of control<clr:ffff>.

<snd:Ease>I mean, the Depths aren't my favorite
place either, but at least they're <clr:0000>not
too hot or too cold<clr:ffff>.
Wherever I get assigned next,<sp:5:0:0> I just hope
it isn't Eldin...
